content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Due to differences in time zones between Lviv and Minsk, it was agreed that system time should be set to UTC+3 Kaliningrad at all workstations of Lviv employees so that time of incoming emails, time in ESP is shown evenly.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Go to Start → Control Panel → Date and Time → Set time zone to UTC+3 (Kaliningrad).\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/91be75f6-f49b-479a-bfdc-59aaa8919425/image2014-10-6%2018:46:34.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":531,\"height\":193}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
